amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2014, LB749, § 298. Operative date January 1, 2016. Waiver of notice.
amendatorysection.para: (1) A director may waive any notice required by the Business Corporation Act, the articles of incorporation, or the bylaws before or after the date and time stated in the notice. Except as provided by subsection (2) of this section, the waiver shall be in writing, signed by the director entitled to the notice, and filed with the minutes or corporate records.

(2) A director's attendance at or participation in a meeting waives any required notice to him or her of the meeting unless the director at the beginning of the meeting or promptly upon his or her arrival objects to holding the meeting or transacting business at the meeting and does not thereafter vote for or assent to action taken at the meeting.
